name: adexchangebuyer_marketplacedeals_delete
description: Delete the specified deals from the proposal

proposalId.description: The proposalId to delete deals from.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

dealIds.description: List of deals to delete for a given proposal

proposalRevisionNumber.description: The last known proposal revision number.

updateAction.description: Indicates an optional action to take on the proposal

$ul: **deals**: List of deals deleted (in the same proposal as passed in the request)
**proposalRevisionNumber**: The updated revision number for the proposal.
